name: Escape From Bodo 17
description:
Captured while travelling through space, the intrepid pilot Dudun is held in an electric labyrinth filled with danger!  Can he scoop up all his cherries and make it back to his ship alive?  Will he be able to decipher all the cryptic alien microchips?  Will the gas people capture him and turn him into some kind of experiment?

Find out in:

ESCAPE FROM BODO 17

Solo entry for the Games Dev Network 2017 Cherry Jam
